actions.committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation

official_title: To permit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to enter into cooperative research and development agreements for environmental protection.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, subject to specified limitations, to enter into cooperative research and development agreements with colleges and universities, State environmental protection agencies, and nonprofit organizations to participate in a cooperative research unit to develop research and training programs relating to environmental protection.

titles.title: To permit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to enter into cooperative research and development agreements for environmental protection.
